DOC.brief_title: Clinical Investigation Modified Rayner Monofocal Aspheric 600C ( With Axis Marks ) Intraocular Lens
DOC.criteria: Male female age ≥21 year age . Cataract phacoemulsification extraction posterior IOL implantation plan operative eye . Best correct distance visual acuity ( BCDVA ) project good 20/30 ( +0.18 logMAR ) operative eye cataract removal IOL implantation . Calculated IOL power requirement within range +8.0 +34.0D If present , subject must corneal astigmatism < 1.50 D operative eye . Expected dilated pupil size ≥ 5.0 mm diameter visualise axis marking Subject must provide write informed consent . Subject must able return schedule followup examination 24 month surgery . History ocular trauma prior ocular surgery operative eye . Microphthalmia Corneal decompensation endothelial insufficiency Pseudo exfoliation Pars planitis Subjects diagnose degenerative visual disorder operative eye ( e.g. , macular degeneration retinal disorder ) predict cause future visual acuity loss level 20/30 ( +0.18 logMAR ) bad . Inability achieve secure placement designate location e.g . absence secure peripheral anterior capsule , zonule laxity dehiscence ; posterior synechiae capsular bag Active ocular disease operative eye , e.g. , clinically significant dystrophy , chronic severe uveitis , proliferative diabetic retinopathy , chronic glaucoma . Concurrent participation another drug device investigation . Patients expect require retinal laser treatment . Females pregnant , nursing plan become pregnant study .
